com.ae.apps.lib.permissions

Interface PermissionsAwareComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPermissionsAwareActivity, ContactsSampleActivity, MultiContactSampleActivity, PermissionCheckingActivity, SmsSampleActivity

    public interface PermissionsAwareComponent
    A Component that is aware of Runtime Permissions. This would typically be an Activity or a Fragment that depends on some runtime permissions to be granted inorder to function
    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPermissionsDenied()
      Callback that is invoked when permissions are denied
      void onPermissionsGranted()
      Callback that is invoked when permissions are granted
      void onPermissionsRequired()
      Callback that is invoked when permissions are required This API is introduced so that the implementing Component can show a view or message to the user about the need for the permissions
      void requestForPermissions()
      Requesting permission to be made on the host as only an Activity or FragmentActivity can do requestPermission
      java.lang.String[] requiredPermissions()
      Indicates the permissions that are required

    • Method Detail

      • requiredPermissions

        java.lang.String[] requiredPermissions()
        Indicates the permissions that are required
        Returns:
        An array of permissions

      • requestForPermissions

        void requestForPermissions()
        Requesting permission to be made on the host as only an Activity or FragmentActivity can do requestPermission

      • onPermissionsRequired

        void onPermissionsRequired()
        Callback that is invoked when permissions are required This API is introduced so that the implementing Component can show a view or message to the user about the need for the permissions
        Since:
        4.0

      • onPermissionsGranted

        void onPermissionsGranted()
        Callback that is invoked when permissions are granted

      • onPermissionsDenied

        void onPermissionsDenied()
        Callback that is invoked when permissions are denied
